tool_description: data from gogoanime website for anime website building and stuff.
name: gogoanime-data-api
title: gogoanime-data-api

api_list.name: GetSinglePageInfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gogoanime-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/majutsushi-orphen-hagure-tabi-seiiki-hen-episode-8"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gogoanime-data-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetRecentAnimes

import requests

url = "https://gogoanime-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/recent/{pagenumber}"
